text: E'ina hunanku monkozama nehunka musema hunka vanoma nehanke'zama kavesima negantaza vahe'tamine, zamavaresrama hunegantaza vahetaminena maka zamavare atru hugahue. Maka zamavare atru hanuge'za manigagine'za negagesage'na kukenaka'a hatetresugenka kavufa kavapako mani'nesanke'za mika oku kavufga kegahaze.
